abstract: India deploys thousands of troops to northern Haryana State to quell rioting and looting by Jats, rural caste; protests have resulted in severe restriction of water supplies to New Delhi and deaths of 10 people.

headline.print_headline: India Sends Troops to Disrupt Protest Parching Delhi
headline.main: India Sends Troops to Disrupt Protest Parching Delhi

snippet: The unrest in Haryana State by the Jats, a rural caste, has left 10 dead, forced factories to close and severely restricted water supplies.
lead_paragraph: The unrest in Haryana State by the Jats, a rural caste, has left 10 dead, forced factories to close and severely restricted water supplies.
